name: Most Wanted Goa Package
description: Discover the best of Goa with this popular package, featuring beautiful beaches, vibrant nightlife, and serene relaxation.

name: Goa Luxury Getaway
description: Indulge in a luxurious stay in Goa, with a private yacht ride, rejuvenating spa treatments, and top-class accommodations.

name: Goa Beach Vibes
description: Relax on Goa’s pristine beaches and enjoy thrilling water sports with this exciting beach vacation package.

name: Royal Rajasthan Tour
description: Experience the royal heritage of Rajasthan with a luxurious stay, guided tours of Jaipur’s magnificent palaces, and a relaxing spa.

name: Jaipur Desert Safari Adventure
description: Embark on a thrilling desert safari in Jaipur with camel rides, cultural experiences, and a stay at a luxurious resort.

name: Kerala Backwater Escape
description: Sail through Kerala’s serene backwaters on a private houseboat and enjoy the local cultural shows in the picturesque town of Kochi.

name: Kerala Hill Station Retreat
description: Escape to the hills of Kerala for a rejuvenating retreat with tea plantation tours, relaxing spa sessions, and a stay in a luxury resort.

name: Himalayan Adventure Trek
description: Explore the rugged landscapes of the Himalayas on a thrilling trek, with breathtaking views and adventure-packed activities.

name: Manali Snow Adventure
description: Experience thrilling snow activities in Manali, including skiing lessons and snowboarding, in the heart of the Himachal mountains.

name: Sikkim Serenity
description: Unwind in the serene landscapes of Sikkim with stunning mountain views, nature walks, and a peaceful stay in Gangtok.

name: Sikkim Adventure Expedition
description: For the adventurous traveler, embark on a thrilling trek and rock climbing expedition in Sikkim, staying in luxury cottages with amazing views.

name: Andaman Beach Escape
description: Explore the idyllic islands of the Andaman Sea, with island hopping, snorkeling, and luxurious accommodations.

name: Andaman Luxury Cruise
description: Indulge in a luxury cruise experience in the Andaman Islands with a private island tour, water activities, and a premium stay at a 5-star resort.

name: Delhi Heritage Tour
description: Dive into Delhi’s rich history with a guided tour of its iconic monuments, including the Red Fort and Qutub Minar.

name: Kolkata Cultural Exploration
description: Immerse yourself in Kolkata’s culture with visits to traditional dance performances, museums, and historical landmarks.

name: Mysore Palace and Wildlife Tour
description: Explore the grandeur of Mysore Palace and experience a thrilling safari tour through nearby wildlife reserves.

name: Mysore Heritage and Nature Escape
description: Combine heritage and nature with a stay in Mysore, exploring its royal palaces and taking nature walks in the nearby reserves.

name: Leh Ladakh Road Trip
description: Embark on an adventurous road trip through Leh Ladakh, with off-road biking, desert camping, and breathtaking landscapes.
